title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-11.1 - Adjustments or recoveries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-11.1 - Adjustments or recoveries

State Regulations

Whenever the Office finds that more or less than the
correct amount of benefits has been paid to an individual or couple actively
receiving SSP benefits or SSPNA, proper adjustment or recovery will be made. Proper adjustments will be made consistent with sections 398-11.2 and
398-11.3
of this Part to those
individuals in active receipt of SSP as defined in section
398-2.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-11.1

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
